file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: Example OpenAPI 3 definition.
  description: Some description
  version: 1.0.0
  license:
    name: MIT
    url: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT

servers:
  - url: 'http://api.redoc.ly'

paths:
  '/ping/items?id=###':
    get:
      operationId: getUserProfileById
      summary: Example summary
      responses:
        '200':
          description: example description

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /ping/items?id=###: get: operation "getUserProfileById": parse path "/ping/items?id=###": path MUST NOT contain a query string
